venue.name: Vinalia's Restaurant, Lounge and Wine Bar

item.description:
Join us for Boston Event Guide's Annual Sinners and Saints Halloween party on Saturday, October 25, 8:30pm at Vinalia Restaurant/bar. Don't miss this fun party!

Featuring complimentary light hors d'oeuvres for the first hour. Then, enjoy a costume contest with over $1,000 in prizes, Complimentary Body Painting, DJ and dancing, and more.

Prizes will be awarded for the:

* Best "Sinner" Costume - Wear something naughty or devilish!
* Best "Saint" Costume - Come dressed sweet and angelic!
* Best Overall Costume - Get creative! Choose a costume outside of the theme.
LOOKING FOR BEST RED SOX SIN OR SAINT COSTUME

NOTE:
Tickets are currently on special, 2 for $25 or $15 each. They are $25 at the door, if available. YOU MUST BUY YOUR OWN TICKET! Last year, the event sold out. They can be purchased at: http://www.bostoneven...


YOU MUST BUY YOUR OWN TICKET!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine at main entr. Call 774 232 0000 if have trouble finding me.
item.name: Sinners and Saints BEG Halloween Party
